text: Bernhard "Barney" Dreyfuss (February 23, 1865 â€“ February 5, 1932) was a German-American executive in Major League Baseball who owned the Pittsburgh Pirates franchise from 1900 to 1932. Dreyfuss was inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame in 2008 following his election by the Veterans Committee. title: Barney Dreyfuss
